mapper.insert: insert into mkt_cam_item (MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP,OFFER_CODE,OFFER_NAME, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID) values (#{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{priority,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{itemGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{offerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT})
mapper.update: update mkt_cam_item set MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = #{mktCampaignId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ITEM_TYPE = #{itemType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, PRIORITY = #{priority,jdbcType=BIGINT}, ITEM_GROUP = #{itemGroup,jdbcType=BIGINT}, OFFER_CODE = #{offerCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OFFER_NAME = #{offerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_CD = #{statusCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STATUS_DATE = #{statusDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATE_STAFF = #{createStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, CREATE_DATE = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATE_STAFF = #{updateStaff,jdbcType=BIGINT}, UPDATE_DATE = #{updateDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, REMARK = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAN_ID = #{lanId,jdbcType=BIGINT} where MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID = #{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, OFFER_CODE,OFFER_NAME, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_item where MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID = #{mktCamItemId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, OFFER_CODE,OFFER_NAME, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_item

select MKT_CAM_ITEM_ID, MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_ID, PRIORITY, ITEM_GROUP, OFFER_CODE,OFFER_NAME, STATUS_CD, STATUS_DATE, CREATE_STAFF, CREATE_DATE, UPDATE_STAFF, UPDATE_DATE, REMARK, LAN_ID from mkt_cam_item where ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and MKT_CAMPAIGN_ID = {campaignId}
